span.span: Displays the values of a data source in a table where each column represents a field and each row represents a record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [列字段Column Fields](#column_fields) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [数据操作Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于在表中显示数据源的值。The control is used to display the values of a data source in a table. 每个列表示一个字段，而每行表示一条记录。Each column represents a field, while each row represents a record. 控件支持以下功能：The control supports the following features: - 绑定到数据源控件，如 。Binding to data source controls, such as . - 内置的排序功能。Built-in sort capabilities. - 内置的更新和删除功能。Built-in update and delete capabilities. - 内置的分页功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 内置行选择功能。Built-in row selection capabilities. - 以编程方式访问 对象模型，以动态设置属性、处理事件等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 多个键字段。Multiple key fields. - 超链接列的多个数据字段。Multiple data fields for the hyperlink columns. - 通过主题和样式自定义外观。Customizable appearance through themes and styles. - 若要了解 ASP.NET 中可用的其他数据绑定控件，请参阅[数据绑定 Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228214(v=vs.100))。To learn about the other data-bound controls that are available in ASP.NET, see [Data-Bound Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228214(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 如果你熟悉 .NET Framework 版本1.0 中的 控件， 控件是 控件的后继控件。If you are familiar with the control from the .NET Framework version 1.0, the control is the successor to the control. ## 列字段Column Fields 控件中的每一列都由一个 对象表示。Each column in the control is represented by a object. 默认情况下， 属性设置为 `true`，这将为数据源中的每个字段创建 对象。By default, the property is set to `true`, which creates an object for each field in the data source. 然后，每个字段以每个字段在数据源中出现的顺序呈现为 控件中的一列。Each field is then rendered as a column in the control in the order that each field appears in the data source. 还可以通过将 属性设置为 `false`，然后定义自己的列字段集合，手动控制在 控件中显示的列字段。You can also manually control which column fields appear in the control by setting the property to `false` and then defining your own column field collection. 不同的列字段类型确定控件中列的行为。Different column field types determine the behavior of the columns in the control. 下表列出了可以使用的不同列字段类型。The following table lists the different column field types that can be used. |列字段类型Column field type|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||显示数据源中的字段的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source. 这是 控件的默认列类型。This is the default column type of the control.| ||显示 控件中每个项的命令按钮。Displays a command button for each item in the control. 这使您能够创建自定义按钮控件的列，例如 "添加" 或 "移除" 按钮。This enables you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the Add or the Remove button.| ||为 控件中的每个项显示一个复选框。Displays a check box for each item in the control. 此列字段类型通常用于显示具有布尔值的字段。This column field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||显示预定义的命令按钮，以执行选择、编辑或删除操作。Displays predefined command buttons to perform select, edit, or delete operations.| ||将数据源中的字段值显示为超链接。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 通过此列字段类型，可以将第二个字段绑定到超链接的 URL。This column field type enables you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||显示 控件中每个项的图像。Displays an image for each item in the control.| ||根据指定的模板为 控件中的每个项显示用户定义的内容。Displays user-defined content for each item in the control according to a specified template. 此列字段类型使您能够创建自定义列字段。This column field type enables you to create a custom column field.| 若要以声明方式定义列字段集合，请首先在 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间添加开始和结束 `` 标记。To define a column field collection declaratively, first add opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下来，列出要在开始和结束 `` 标记之间包括的列字段。Next, list the column fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 指定的列按列出顺序添加到 集合中。The columns specified are added to the collection in the order listed. 集合存储控件中的所有列字段，并使您能够以编程方式管理 控件中的列字段。The collection stores all the column fields in the control and enables you to programmatically manage the column fields in the control. 显式声明的列字段可与自动生成的列字段一起显示。Explicitly declared column fields can be displayed in combination with automatically generated column fields. 如果同时使用这两个列，则将首先呈现显式声明的列字段，后跟自动生成的列字段。When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields. > [!NOTE] > 自动生成的列字段不会添加到 集合中。Automatically generated column fields are not added to the collection. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件可以绑定到数据源控件（如 控件或 控件），也可以绑定到实现 接口的任何数据源集合，例如 、、或其他集合类型。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用以下方法之一将 控件绑定到相应的数据源类型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要绑定到数据源控件，请将 控件的 属性设置为数据源控件的 值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件，并可以利用数据源控件的功能执行排序、更新、删除和分页。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform sorting, updating, deleting, and paging. 这是绑定到数据的首选方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 若要绑定到实现 接口的数据源，请以编程方式将 控件的 属性设置为数据源，然后调用 方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 使用此方法时， 控件不提供内置排序、更新、删除和分页功能。When using this method, the control does not provide built-in sort, update, delete, and paging functionality. 需要使用相应的事件来提供此功能。You need to provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100))。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 在此控件中显示值之前，强烈建议您尽可能对值进行 HTML 编码（默认情况下， 类对值进行 HTML 编码）。Whenever possible, it is strongly recommended that values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in this control (the class HTML-encodes values by default). ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证控件简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85)). ## 数据操作Data Operations 控件提供了许多内置功能，使用户可以对控件中的项进行排序、更新、删除、选择和分页。The control provides many built-in capabilities that allow the user to sort, update, delete, select, and page through items in the control. 将 控件绑定到数据源控件时， 控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动排序、更新和删除功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sort, update, and delete functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控件可以提供对其他类型的数据源的排序、更新和删除的支持。The control can provide support for sorting, updating, and deleting with other types of data sources. 但是，你将需要为这些操作的实现提供相应的事件处理程序。However, you will need to provide an appropriate event handler with the implementation for these operations. 排序允许用户通过单击列的标题，对 控件中的项进行排序。Sorting allows the user to sort the items in the control with respect to a specific column by clicking on the column's header. 若要启用排序，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable sorting, set the property to `true`. 单击 "编辑"、"删除"、"删除" 和 "选择" 命令名称的 按钮时，自动更新、删除和选择功能将启用。The automatic updating, deleting, and selection functionalities are enabled when a button in a or column field, with a command name of "Edit", "Delete", and "Select", respectively, is clicked. 如果 ""、"" 或 "" 属性分别设置为 `true`， 控件可以使用 "编辑"、"删除" 或 "选择" 按钮自动添加 的列字段。The control can automatically add a column field with an Edit, Delete, or Select button if the , , or property is set to `true`, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 控件不直接支持将记录插入到数据源中。Inserting records into the data source is not directly supported by the control. 但是，可以通过将 控件与 `DetailsView` 或 `FormView` 控件结合使用来插入记录。However, it is possible to insert records by using the control in conjunction with the `DetailsView` or `FormView` control. 有关详细信息，请分别参阅 或 。For more information, see or , respectively. 控件可以自动将记录分为多页，而不是同时在数据源中显示所有记录。Instead of displaying all the records in the data source at the same time, the control can automatically break the records up into pages. 若要启用分页，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 控件基于存储在 中的信息在回发时重新创建。The control is re-created on postback based on the information that is stored in . 如果 控件包括 或 将 属性设置为 `true`，则 属性还必须设置为 `true`，以确保并发数据操作（如更新和删除）应用于相应的行。If the control includes a or a with the property set to `true`, then the property must also be set to `true` to ensure that concurrent data operations, such as updates and deletes, apply to the appropriate row. ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 您可以通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性来自定义 控件的外观。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| || 控件中的交替数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the alternating data rows in the control. 设置此属性时，数据行将在 设置和 设置之间交替显示。When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings.| || 控件中正在编辑的行的样式设置。The style settings for the row being edited in the control.| ||当数据源不包含任何记录时， 控件中显示的空数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the empty data row displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| || 控件的脚注行的样式设置。The style settings for the footer row of the control.| || 控件的标题行的样式设置。The style settings for the header row of the control.| || 控件的页导航行的样式设置。The style settings for the pager row of the control.| || 控件中的数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the data rows in the control. 如果同时设置了 属性，则会在 设置与 设置之间交替显示数据行。When the property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the settings and the settings.| || 控件中的所选行的样式设置。The style settings for the selected row in the control.| ||在 控件中对数据进行排序的数据列的样式设置。The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the control. 设置此样式后，当数据按升序排序时，样式（例如突出显示的列）将应用于单元格。When this style is set, the style (for example, highlighted column) is applied to cells when the data is sorted in ascending order.| ||在 控件中对数据进行排序的数据列的样式设置。The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the control. 如果设置此样式，则在按升序对数据进行排序时，将在 控件的标头上放置一个指示数据按升序排序的箭头。When this style is set, an arrow indicating the data is sorted ascending is placed on the header of the control when the data is sorted in ascending order.| ||在 控件中对数据进行排序的数据列的样式设置。The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the control. 如果设置此样式，则在按降序对数据进行排序时，样式（例如突出显示的列）将应用于单元。When this style is set, the style (for example, highlighted column) is applied to cells when the data is sorted in descending order.| ||在 控件中对数据进行排序的数据列的样式设置。The style setting for the data column the data is sorted by in the control. 如果设置此样式，则在按降序对数据进行排序时，将向下箭头置于 的标头。When this style is set, an arrow pointing down is placed on the header of the when the data is sorted in descending order.| 还可以显示或隐藏控件的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出了属性，这些属性控制要显示或隐藏的部分。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |属性Property|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏 控件的页脚部分。Shows or hides the footer section of the control.| ||显示或隐藏 控件的标头部分。Shows or hides the header section of the control.| ## EventsEvents 控件提供了多个可对其进行编程的事件。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这使您可以在每次发生事件时运行自定义例程。This enables you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了 控件支持的事件。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 当用户导航到控件中的其他页面后，如果需要执行某个任务，通常会使用此事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different page in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ||在单击某一行的 "取消" 按钮时，但在 控件退出编辑模式之前发生。Occurs when a row's Cancel button is clicked, but before the control exits edit mode. 此事件通常用于停止取消操作。This event is often used to stop the canceling operation.| ||在 控件中单击某个按钮时发生。Occurs when a button is clicked in the control. 此事件通常用于在控件中单击按钮时执行任务。This event is often used to perform a task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在 控件中创建新行时发生。Occurs when a new row is created in the control. 此事件通常用于在创建行时修改行的内容。This event is often used to modify the contents of a row when the row is created.| ||当数据行绑定到 控件中的数据时发生。Occurs when a data row is bound to data in the control. 当行绑定到数据时，此事件通常用于修改行的内容。This event is often used to modify the contents of a row when the row is bound to data.| ||在单击某一行的 "删除" 按钮时，但在 控件从数据源中删除该记录后发生。Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||在单击某一行的 "删除" 按钮时，但在 控件从数据源中删除该记录之前发生。Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于取消删除操作。This event is often used to cancel the deleting operation.| ||发生在单击某一行的“编辑”按钮以后， 控件进入编辑模式之前。Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 此事件通常用于取消编辑操作。This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| ||发生在单击某一行的“更新”按钮，并且 控件对该行进行更新之后。Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||发生在单击某一行的“更新”按钮以后， 控件对该行进行更新之前。Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the row. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作。This event is often used to cancel the updating operation.| ||发生在单击某一行的“选择”按钮， 控件对相应的选择操作进行处理之后。Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the control handles the select operation. 此事件通常用于在控件中选择行后执行任务。This event is often used to perform a task after a row is selected in the control.| ||发生在单击某一行的“选择”按钮以后， 控件对相应的选择操作进行处理之前。Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. 此事件通常用于取消选择操作。This event is often used to cancel the selection operation.| ||在单击用于列排序的超链接时，但在 控件对相应的排序操作进行处理之后发生。Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用于在用户单击用于对列进行排序的超链接后执行任务。This event is commonly used to perform a task after the user clicks a hyperlink to sort a column.| ||在单击用于列排序的超链接时，但在 控件对相应的排序操作进行处理之前发生。Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用于取消排序操作或执行自定义的排序例程。This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140))和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` remarks.format: ## Remarks 分页使您能够以区块显示 控件的内容。Paging enables you to display the contents of the control in chunks. 页面上的项数由 属性确定。The number of items on a page is determined by the property. 通常，每次 控件移动到不同的页时，都会读取数据源中的每一行。Normally, every row in the data source is read every time the control moves to a different page. 当数据源中的总项数非常大时，这可能会占用大量资源。This can consume a lot of resources when the total number of items in the data source is very large. 自定义分页允许您只从数据源中读取单个页面所需的项。Custom paging allows you to read just the items you need for a single page from the data source. 要启用自定义分页，请将 "" 和 "" 属性都设置为 "`true`"。To enable custom paging, set both the and properties to `true`. 在 事件的处理程序中，将 属性设置为新的页索引值，将 属性设置为数据源中的总项数，将数据源设置为仅返回当前页面所需的行，并调用 方法。In a handler for the event, set the property to the new page index value, set the property to the total number of items in the data source, set the data source to return only the rows needed for the current page, and call the method. 通过 属性，控件可以确定总页数;此值通常通过读取所有项自动确定。The property enables the control to determine the total number of pages; this value is normally determined automatically by reading all of the items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以自动将记录分为多页，而不是同时在数据源中显示所有记录。Instead of displaying all the records in the data source at the same time, the control can automatically break the records up into pages. 如果数据源支持分页功能，则 控件可以利用该功能，并提供内置的分页功能。If the data source supports the paging capability, the control can take advantage of that and provide built-in paging functionality. 分页功能可用于支持 接口的任何数据源对象或支持分页功能的数据源。The paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface or a data source that supports paging capability. 若要启用分页功能，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 默认情况下， 控件一次一页显示10条记录。By default, the control displays 10 records on a page at a time. 您可以通过设置 "" 属性来更改页面上显示的记录数。You can change the number of records displayed on a page by setting the property. 若要确定显示数据源内容所需的总页数，请使用 属性。To determine the total number of pages required to display the data source contents, use the property. 您可以通过使用 属性来确定当前显示的页的索引。You can determine the index of the currently displayed page by using the property. 启用分页时，会自动在 控件中显示一个名为 "页导航行" 的附加行。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含允许用户导航到其他页的控件。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages. 通过使用 "" 属性，可以控制页导航行的设置（如页导航显示模式、一次显示的页链接的数目以及页导航控件的文本标签）。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text labels) by using the property. 通过设置 "" 属性，可以在控件的顶部、底部或同时显示页的顶部和底部。The pager row can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control by setting the property. 还可以通过设置 "" 属性，从四个内置的页导航显示模式中选择一个。You can also select from one of four built-in pager display modes by setting the property. 下表介绍了内置的显示模式。The following table describes the built-in display modes. |模式Mode|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`PagerButton.NextPrevious`|一组由 "上一页" 和 "下一页" 按钮组成的分页控件。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous and next buttons.| |`PagerButton.NextPreviousFirstLast`|由 "上一个"、"下一步"、"上一步" 和 "最后一个" 按钮组成A set of pagination controls consisting of previous, next, first, and last buttons.| |`PagerButton.Numeric`|一组由用于直接访问页的带编号的链接按钮组成的分页控件。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly. 这是默认模式。This is the default mode.| |`PagerButton.NumericFirstLast`|一组由编号和第一个和最后一个链接按钮组成的分页控件。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and first and last link buttons.| 若要控制页导航行的外观（包括其背景色、字体颜色和位置），请使用 "" 属性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color, font color, and position), use the property. > [!NOTE] > 当数据源仅包含一页记录时， 控件将自动隐藏页导航行。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains only one page of records. 控件还允许您为页导航行定义自定义模板。The control also enables you to define a custom template for the pager row. 有关创建自定义页导航行模板的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about creating a custom pager row template, see . 控件提供了多个可用于在进行分页时执行自定义操作的事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 当用户导航到控件中的其他页面后，如果需要执行某个任务，通常会使用此事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different page in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以声明方式启用 控件中的分页功能。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to declaratively enable the paging feature in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当支持排序的数据源控件绑定到 控件时， 控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动的排序功能。When a data source control that supports sorting is bound to the control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sorting functionality. 通过以编程方式设置 属性将 控件绑定到数据源时，必须使用 事件提供排序功能。When the control is bound to a data source by setting the property programmatically, you must provide the sorting functionality by using the event. > [!NOTE] > 不同数据源对启用其排序功能具有不同的要求。Different data sources have different requirements for enabling their sorting capabilities. 若要确定要求，请参阅特定数据源的文档。To determine the requirements, see the documentation for the specific data source. 若要启用排序，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable sorting, set the property to `true`. 启用排序功能后，每个包含 属性集的列字段的标题文本都将显示为链接按钮。When sorting is enabled, the heading text for each column field with its property set is displayed as a link button. > [!NOTE] > 自动生成的列字段的 属性会自动填充。The property for an automatically generated columns field is automatically populated. 如果通过 集合定义自己的列，则必须为每一列设置 属性;否则，列将不会在标头中显示链接按钮。If you define your own columns through the collection, you must set the property for each column; otherwise, the column will not display the link button in the header. 单击某个列的链接按钮将导致 控件中的项根据排序表达式进行排序。Clicking the link button for a column causes the items in the control to be sorted based on the sort expression. 通常，排序表达式只是显示在列中的字段的名称，这会使 控件针对该列进行排序。Typically, the sort expression is simply the name of the field displayed in the column, which causes the control to sort with respect to that column. 若要按多个字段进行排序，请使用包含以逗号分隔的字段名称列表的排序表达式。To sort by multiple fields, use a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names. 您可以使用 属性确定 控件正在应用的排序表达式。You can determine the sort expression that the control is applying by using the property. 再次单击某一列的链接按钮会在升序和降序之间切换排序顺序。Clicking a column's link button repeatedly toggles the sort direction between ascending and descending order. 若要确定当前的排序方向，请使用 属性。To determine the current sort direction, use the property. 控件提供了几个可用于在进行排序时执行自定义操作的事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when sorting occurs. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击用于列排序的超链接时，但在 控件对相应的排序操作进行处理之后发生。Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用于在用户单击用于对列进行排序的超链接后执行任务。This event is commonly used to perform a task after the user clicks a hyperlink to sort a column.| ||在单击用于列排序的超链接时，但在 控件对相应的排序操作进行处理之前发生。Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用于取消排序操作或执行自定义的排序例程。This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示在使用自动生成的列时，如何使用 属性启用 控件中的排序。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable sorting in a control when automatically generated columns are used. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewAllowSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowSorting/CS/gridviewallowsortingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewAllowSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowSorting/VB/gridviewallowsortingvb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示在定义 集合时，如何使用 属性启用 控件中的排序。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable sorting in a control when a collection is defined. 还可以通过编程方式将图像添加到要排序的列的标头，以指示排序方向。An image is also programmatically added to the header of the column being sorted to indicate the sort direction. 若要使此示例正常工作，您必须提供自己的图像。You must provide your own images for this sample to work. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewAllowSortingColumns#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowSortingColumns/CS/GridViewAllowSortingColumnscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewAllowSortingColumns#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewAllowSortingColumns/VB/GridViewAllowSortingColumnsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `true`时，会为数据源中的每个字段自动创建 对象。When the property is set to `true`, an object is automatically created for each field in the data source. 然后，每个字段在 控件中按字段在数据源中显示的顺序显示为一列。Each field is then displayed as a column in the control in the order that the fields appear in the data source. 使用此选项可以方便地显示数据源中的每个字段;但是，您控制自动生成的列字段的显示方式或行为方式受到限制。This option provides a convenient way to display every field in the data source; however, you have limited control of how an automatically generated column field is displayed or behaves. 您可以通过将 属性设置为 `false` 然后创建自定义 `Columns` 集合，来手动定义列字段，而不是让 控件自动生成列字段。Instead of letting the control automatically generate the column fields, you can manually define the column fields by setting the property to `false` and then creating a custom `Columns` collection. 除了绑定列字段外，还可以根据自己的自定义模板，显示按钮列字段、复选框列字段、命令字段、超链接列字段、图像字段或列字段。In addition to bound column fields, you can also display a button column field, a check box column field, a command field, a hyperlink column field, an image field, or a column field based on your own custom-defined template. 您还可以将显式声明的列字段与自动生成的列字段合并在一起。You can also combine explicitly declared column fields with automatically generated column fields. 如果同时使用这两个列，则将首先呈现显式声明的列字段，后跟自动生成的列字段。When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields. 自动生成的绑定列字段不会添加到 集合中。Automatically generated bound column fields are not added to the collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 如果将此属性设置为 `true` 并将 属性设置为模型类型，则会生成 控件。If you set this property to `true` and set the property to a model type, controls are generated. 如果未设置 属性，则将生成 控件。If you do not set the property, controls are generated. 如果不想 控件，可以使用以下选项：If you do not want controls, you have the following options: - 将 属性设置为在 `Page_Load` 事件处理程序中 `null`。Set the property to `null` in the `Page_Load` event handler. 在这种情况下，将生成 控件。In that case, controls are generated. - 编写自定义代码，通过创建和分配自己的 类并将其实例分配给控件来自动生成字段。Write custom code to automatically generate fields by creating and assigning your own class and assigning an instance of it to the control. - remarks.format: ## Remarks 当支持删除的数据源控件绑定到 控件时， 控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动删除功能。When a data source control that supports deleting is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic deleting functionality. > [!NOTE] > 对于用于删除数据的数据源控件，必须将其配置为删除数据。For a data source control to delete data, it must be configured to delete data. 若要配置数据源控件以删除记录，请参阅特定数据源控件的文档。To configure a data source control to delete records, see the documentation for the specific data source control. 属性设置为 `true`时，会自动将每个数据行的 "删除" 按钮的列（由 对象表示）添加到 控件中。When the property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a object) with a Delete button for each data row is automatically added to the control. 单击某一行的 "删除" 按钮可从数据源中永久删除该记录。Clicking the Delete button for a row permanently removes that record from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 您还必须设置 属性以标识数据源的一个或多个键字段，才能使自动删除功能工作。You must also set the property to identify the key field or fields of the data source for the automatic deleting feature to work. 控件提供了几个可用于在删除行时执行自定义操作的事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a row is deleted. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击某一行的 "删除" 按钮时，但在 控件从数据源中删除该记录后发生。Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||在单击某一行的 "删除" 按钮时，但在 控件从数据源中删除该记录之前发生。Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于取消删除操作。This event is often used to cancel the deleting operation.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性启用 控件的自动删除功能。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the automatic deleting feature of a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持更新的数据源控件绑定到 控件，则 控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动更新功能。When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. > [!NOTE] > 对于用于更新数据的数据源控件，必须将其配置为更新数据。For a data source control to update data, it must be configured to update data. 若要配置数据源控件以更新记录，请参阅特定数据源控件的文档。To configure a data source control to update records, see the documentation for the specific data source control. 当 属性设置为 `true`时，会自动将每个数据行的一个列（由 对象表示）与 "编辑" 按钮一起添加到 控件中。When the property is set to `true`, a column (represented by a object) with an Edit button for each data row is automatically added to the control. 单击某一行的 "编辑" 按钮将该行置于编辑模式。Clicking an Edit button for a row puts that row in edit mode. 如果行处于编辑模式，则行中非只读的每个列字段都将显示相应的输入控件，如 控件的字段数据类型。When a row is in edit mode, each column field in the row that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a control, for the field's data type. 这允许用户修改字段的值。This allows the user to modify the field's value. 单击 "编辑" 按钮后，还会将其替换为 "更新" 按钮和 "取消" 按钮。When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 单击 "更新" 按钮可更新数据源中的行，并返回任何值，并将该行返回到显示模式。Clicking the Update button updates the row in the data source with any value changes and returns the row to display mode. 单击 "取消" 按钮将放弃任何值更改，并将该行返回到显示模式。Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the row to display mode. > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过使用行的索引设置 属性，以编程方式将行置于编辑模式。You can programmatically put a row in edit mode by setting the property with the index of the row. 若要以编程方式退出编辑模式，请将 属性设置为-1。To programmatically exit edit mode, set the property to -1. 使用内置更新功能时，必须使用以逗号分隔的字段名称列表来设置 属性，以标识数据源的一个或多个主键字段;否则，内置的更新功能将不能更新正确的记录。When using the built-in updating functionality, you must set the property with a comma-separated list of field names to identify the primary key field or fields of the data source; otherwise, the built-in updating functionality will not be able to update the correct record. 当使用自动生成的字段列（通过将 属性设置为 `true`）时， 控件会自动确保与 属性中指定的字段相对应的自动生成的字段列是只读的。When using automatically generated field columns (by setting the property to `true`), the control automatically ensures that the automatically generated field columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the property are read-only. 您可以使用 属性控制处于编辑模式的行的外观。You can control the appearance of a row that is in edit mode by using the property. 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. 控件提供了几个可用于在更新行时执行自定义操作的事件。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a row is updated. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击某一行的 "取消" 按钮时，但在 控件取消编辑模式之前发生。Occurs when a row's Cancel button is clicked, but before the control cancels out of edit mode. 此事件通常用于停止取消操作。This event is often used to stop the canceling operation.| ||发生在单击某一行的“编辑”按钮以后， 控件进入编辑模式之前。Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 此事件通常用于取消编辑操作。This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| ||发生在单击某一行的“更新”按钮，并且 控件对该行进行更新之后。Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||发生在单击某一行的“更新”按钮以后， 控件对该行进行更新之前。Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the row. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作。This event is often used to cancel the updating operation.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性启用 控件的自动编辑功能。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the automatic editing feature of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 列字段表示 控件中的列。A column field represents a column in a control. 属性（集合）用于存储在 控件中呈现的所有显式声明的列字段。The property (collection) is used to store all the explicitly declared column fields that get rendered in the control. 你还可以使用 集合以编程方式管理列字段的集合。You can also use the collection to programmatically manage the collection of column fields. > [!NOTE] > 显式声明的列字段可与自动生成的列字段结合使用。Explicitly declared column fields can be used in combination with automatically generated column fields. 如果同时使用这两个列，则将首先呈现显式声明的列字段，后跟自动生成的列字段。When both are used, explicitly declared column fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated column fields. 自动生成的列字段不会添加到 集合中。Automatically generated column fields are not added to the collection. 列字段在 控件中的显示顺序与列字段在 集合中的显示顺序相同。The column fields are displayed in the control in the order that the column fields appear in the collection. 下表显示派生自 类的不同列字段类，并且可以在 集合中使用。The following table shows the different column field classes that derive from the class and can be used in the collection. |列字段类型Column field type|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||显示数据源中的字段的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source. 这是 控件的默认列类型。This is the default column type of the control.| ||显示 控件中每个项的命令按钮。Displays a command button for each item in the control. 这使您能够创建自定义按钮控件的列，例如 "添加" 或 "移除" 按钮。This enables you to create a column of custom button controls, such as the Add or the Remove button.| ||为 控件中的每个项显示一个复选框。Displays a check box for each item in the control. 此列字段类型通常用于显示具有布尔值的字段。This column field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||显示预定义的命令按钮，以执行选择、编辑或删除操作。Displays predefined command buttons to perform select, edit, or delete operations.| ||将数据源中的字段值显示为超链接。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 通过此列字段类型，可以将第二个字段绑定到超链接的 URL。This column field type enables you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||显示 控件中每个项的图像。Displays an image for each item in the control.| ||根据指定的模板，为 控件中的每个项显示用户定义的内容。Displays user-defined content for each item in the control, according to a specified template. 此列字段类型使您能够创建自定义列字段。This column field type enables you to create a custom column field.| 虽然您可以通过编程方式将列字段添加到 集合，但在 的控件中以声明方式列出列字段更为简单，并使用每个列字段的 属性来显示或隐藏每个列字段。Although you can programmatically add column fields to the collection, it is easier to list the column fields declaratively in the control and then use the property of each column field to show or hide each column field. 如果列字段的 属性设置为 `false`，则该列不会显示在 控件中，列的数据不会对客户端进行往返。If the property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client. 如果希望不可见的列的数据进行往返，请将字段名称添加到 属性中。If you want the data for a column that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式填充 集合。The following example demonstrates how to populate the collection declaratively. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击某一行的 "删除" 按钮时，但在 控件删除该行之前，将引发 事件。The event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the row. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程（如取消删除操作）。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs. 将 对象传递到事件处理方法，这使您能够确定当前行的索引，并指示应取消删除操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要取消删除操作，请将 对象的 属性设置为 "`true`"。To cancel the delete operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果需要，还可以在将值传递给数据源之前操作 和 集合。You can also manipulate the and collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件取消删除操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel the delete operation. 页面包含一个 控件，该控件显示 AdventureWorksLT 数据库中的客户名称和地址列表。The page contains a control that displays a list of customer names and addresses from the AdventureWorksLT database. 当用户单击某一行的 "**删除**" 链接时， 事件的处理程序将检查用户尝试删除的行中显示的人员的姓氏。When the user clicks the **Delete** link for a row, the handler for the event checks the last name of the person displayed in the row that the user is trying to delete. 如果姓氏为 "Beaver"，则取消删除操作，并显示一条错误消息。If the last name is "Beaver", the delete operation is canceled, and an error message is displayed. 对于任何其他名称，删除操作将继续，并删除该行。For any other name, the delete operation proceeds and the row is deleted. 事件处理程序使用 对象的 属性查找用户尝试删除的行。The event handler uses the property of the object to find the row that the user is trying to delete. 该示例将检查 集合的内容。The example examines the contents of the collection. 如果要比较的值是键值，可以改为检查 的集合。If the value you want to compare to is a key value, you could examine the collection instead. 将从 CustomerAddress 表而不是 Customer 表中删除行，以便使示例简单。Rows are deleted from the CustomerAddress table instead of the Customer table in order to keep the example simple. 控件显示联接三个表的结果： Customer、Address 和 CustomerAddress。The control shows the result of joining three tables: Customer, Address, and CustomerAddress. 删除 CustomerAddress 行后，相应的 行将消失。When a CustomerAddress row is deleted, the corresponding row disappears. 引用完整性约束会使实际删除 Customer 表中的行的示例代码更复杂。Referential integrity constraints would make the code for an example that actually deletes rows from the Customer table more complex. 有关如何设置 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的信息，请参阅[如何：为 ASP.NET 开发设置 AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。For information about how to set up the AdventureWorksLT database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356). remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以指定在 控件处于分页模式时所选行的保留方式。You can specify how selected rows are persisted when the control is in paging mode. 默认情况下，行选择基于行索引。By default, row selection is based on row index. 在每一页上都选择了同一行（例如，第三行）。The same row (for example, the third row) is selected on each page. 或者，您可以基于所选行的数据键启用持久性。Alternatively, you can enable persistence based on the data key of the selected row. 在这种情况下，如果你选择第1页上的第3行并移动到第2页，则第2页上未选择任何行。In that case, if you select row 3 on page 1 and you move to page 2, no row is selected on page 2. 如果向后移动到第1页，则仍选择第3行。If you move back to page 1, row 3 is still selected. 若要启用此功能，请将此属性设置为 `true`。To enable this functionality, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 版本2.0、3.0 和3.5 中，行选择仅基于行索引。In versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 of ASP.NET, row selection was based only on row index. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 中的行选择基于用于向后兼容的索引。By default, row selection in ASP.NET 4 is based on index for backward compatibility.
